sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous commençons les cours à huit heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We start class at eight o'clock.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shēngbìng le, bù néng lái shàngbān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est malade et ne peut pas venir travailler.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is sick and cannot come to work.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime écouter de la musique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like to listen to music.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn yīfu tài guì le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce vêtement est trop cher.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This piece of clothing is too expensive.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est ma camarade de classe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is my classmate.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil se couche à l'ouest.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sun sets in the west.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jìde nǐ de diànhuà hàomǎ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me souviens de ton numéro de téléphone.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I remember your phone number.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil se lève à l'est.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sun rises in the east.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette réponse n'est pas correcte.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This answer is not correct.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: As-tu dîné ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Have you eaten dinner?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen bān yǒu shíwǔ gè nánshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre classe a quinze garçons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our class has fifteen boys.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zuò, wǒ qù gěi nǐ dào chá.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Asseyez-vous, je vais vous servir du thé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please sit down, I'll pour you some tea.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bié dòng, wǒ bāng nǐ pāizhào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne bouge pas, je te prends en photo.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't move, I'll take your photo.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La clé est sous la table.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The key is under the table.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xiàkè hòu wǒmen qù dǎqiú ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allons jouer au ballon après les cours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's go play ball after class.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bonjour ! Il fait vraiment beau aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Morning! The weather is really nice today.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel jour sommes-nous aujourd'hui ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What day is today?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xuéxiào pángbiān yǒu yī jiā shūdiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a une librairie à côté de l'école.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a bookstore next to the school.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux sortir me promener.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to go out for a walk.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis arrivé à la maison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I arrived home.
